00159 void joSpotLight::_validate(bool for_real)
00160 {
00161         copy_info();
00162         input1().validate( for_real );
00163         if ( intensity <= 0 || info_.is_constant()) 
00164         {
00165                 set_out_channels(Mask_None);
00166                 return;
00167         }
00168 
00169         if ( SPosX == 0 && SPosY == 0 && SPosZ == 0 ) 
00170         {
00171                 set_out_channels(Mask_None);
00172                 return;
00173         }
00174 
00175         if ( coneDeltaAngle > coneAngle ) 
00176         {
00177                 set_out_channels(Mask_None);
00178                 return;
00179         }
00180 
00181 
00182         Format test = info_.format();
00183         width = test.width();
00184         height = test.height();
00185         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00186         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r()+ 1, info_.t() + 1 );
00187 }

00189 void joSpotLight::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00190 {
00191         input0().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00192         input1().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00193 }
00196 float smoothstep( float min,  float max, float x )
00197 {
00198         
00199         if( x < min )
00200         {
00201                 return 0.0f;
00202         } else if( x >= max )
00203         {
00204                 return 1.0f;
00205         } else
00206         {
00207                 return ( x - min ) / ( max - min );
00208         }
00209 
00210 }
00211 
00212 void joSpotLight::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00213 {
00215         out.range( 0, width );
00217         Row in1(x, r);
00218         Row in2(x, r);
00219 
00220         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00221         input1().get(y, x, r, channels, in2);
00223         foreach (z, channels) 
00224         {
00226                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00227                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00228                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00230                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00231                 {
00233                         Vector N( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index], in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00234                         Vector I( in2[Chan_Red][index], in2[Chan_Green][index], in2[Chan_Blue][index] );
00235 
00237                         Vector A = Vector( TPosX, TPosY, TPosZ ) - Vector( SPosX, SPosY, SPosZ );
00238                         Vector L = I - Vector( SPosX, SPosY, SPosZ );
00239 
00241                         if ( I.length() > 0.0001f )
00242                         {
00244                                 A.normalize();
00246                                 float dist = L.length() / distDiv;
00248                                 dist = dist * dist;
00250                                 L.normalize();
00251                                 
00252                                 Vector result;
00254                                 float cosoutside = cos( coneAngle * DEG_TO_RAD );
00255                                 float cosinside = cos( coneAngle * DEG_TO_RAD - coneDeltaAngle * DEG_TO_RAD );
00256                                 float coscurrent = L.dot( A );
00257 
00259                                 L.neg();
00261                                 if ( coscurrent > cosoutside )
00262                                 {
00263                                         
00264                                         float specAmount = 0.0f;
00266                                         float atten = (float)pow( (double)coscurrent, (double)beam );
00267                                         atten *= smoothstep( cosoutside, cosinside, coscurrent ); 
00269                                         float diffuse = L.dot( N ); 
00271                                         if ( attenuate )
00272                                         {
00274                                                 atten *= 1 / dist;
00275                                         }
00276 
00278                                         if ( doSpec )
00279                                         {
00281                                                 Vector R = L.reflection( N );
00283                                                 R.normalize();
00285                                                 if ( N.dot( L ) > 0 )
00286                                                 {
00288                                                         specAmount = pow( I.dot( R ), roughness );
00289                                                 }
00290                                         }
00292                                         if( ligthVectors )
00293                                         {
00294                                                 result.x = L.x * atten;
00295                                                 result.y = L.y * atten;
00296                                                 result.z = L.z * atten;
00297 
00298                                         } else
00300                                         {
00301                                                 result.x = colorR * diffuse * intensity * atten + specAmount;
00302                                                 result.y = colorG * diffuse * intensity * atten + specAmount;
00303                                                 result.z = colorB * diffuse * intensity * atten + specAmount;
00304                                         }
00305                                         
00306                                 } else
00307                                 {
00308                                         result.setVector( 0, 0, 0 );
00309                                 }
00310                                 
00311                                 outPixelsR[index] = result.x;
00312                                 outPixelsG[index] = result.y;
00313                                 outPixelsB[index] = result.z;
00314                         } else
00315                         {
00316                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00317                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00318                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00319                         }
00320 
00321                         
00322                 }
00323                 
00324         }
00325 }
